name: Re-Quest
description:
RE-QUEST
by Freebee
Description
-------------------
RE-QUEST is a management game created for the Bored Pixels Jam 8 game jam, hosted on itch.io. In RE-QUEST, you play as a quest giver, giving quests to heroes who will in turn reward you with items and money if they are successful.
How to play
-------------------
RE-QUEST is a simple game to play. Use the map icon to send heroes out on quests, and they can return with money. The goal is to survive each week by having enough money to pay for the rent.
